Title: Repeals sections 1 and 1-a of part FFF of chapter 56 of the laws of 2020
Summary: Relates to directing the department of health to remove the pharmacy benefit from the managed care benefit package; provides the pharmacy benefit under the fee for service program.
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal sections 1 and 1-a of part FFF of chapter 56 of the laws of 2020 relating to directing the department of health to remove the pharmacy benefit from the managed care benefit package and to provide the pharmacy benefit under the fee for service program
